full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL CHEN RTA MGRIN YANG GSANG KHROS PA'I LAS BYANG RTA MCHOG BZHAD PA'I SGRA DBYANGS KYI ZUR RGYAN KUN BZANG RNAM ROL ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
